Reason: The 'hinted_handoff_throttle_in_kb' configuration is performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly impacts the rate at which hints are delivered to a particular node from the rest of the cluster. The throttle value set by this configuration affects the performance of the system by controlling the hint traffic flow. The configuration is used to prevent overload situations and ensure a balanced hint delivery process by adjusting the throttle based on the number of nodes in the cluster. The code related to this configuration involves time-expensive operations such as rate limiting and dispatching hints, which directly contribute to system performance variations at the system level.
